effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon's moves have [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit} rates one stage higher than normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises moves' [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit} rates one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
相手の　急所に
攻撃が　当たりやすい。

Boosts the critical-hit
ratios of moves.

Aumenta la probabilità di
infliggere brutti colpi.

Aumenta la probabilidad de dar
golpes críticos.

Erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit,
einen Volltreffer zu landen.

Augmente la fréquence des
coups critiques.

あいての　きゅうしょに
こうげきが　あたりやすい。

Heightens the critical-
hit ratios of moves.

des coups critiques.
